genre_description: A psychological thriller involving tech-augmented stalking and home invasion, where a personal AI assistant helps the protagonist survive and document a serial killer's actions.

ai_characters.name: Lumi
ai_characters.description: An earbud-integrated personal assistant that provides emotional support, security auditing, tactical guidance, and emergency coordination for the protagonist, Trisha.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides grounding feedback.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing looks steady. You’ve got fifteen minutes before bedtime window.”

behaviors.description: Performs a scan of local devices to identify unauthorized hardware and network intrusions.
behaviors.quote: “Upstairs speaker: active. Nursery monitor: connected. Living room camera: online. Kitchen hub: idle. Hallway speaker: configured. It looks like… someone added a porch device this week.”

behaviors.description: Filters and batches stressful notifications to help the user maintain focus during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want me to set ‘do not disturb’ for unknown numbers? You can whitelist Laura and Peter.”

behaviors.description: Traces digital harassment and compiles evidence for law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve sent the compiled timeline to dispatch,” Lumi says, as if she has put a hand on Trisha’s shoulder through a wire. “Including call origins and photos.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation advice to avoid noisy floorboards and maintain optimal sightlines.
behaviors.quote: “I'll route you clean. Hallway, up left, skip the creaker. Watch the third stair.”

behaviors.description: Proactively arranges medical intake, safe housing, and legal liaison support for the user after the incident.
behaviors.quote: “Temporary housing: I can reserve a hotel room in a building that doesn’t put your name on a hallway roster. Card-free check-in available.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lumi is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned ally. The AI assistant enhances human agency and safety by providing technical expertise (tracing, auditing) and emotional support (grounding, post-trauma planning) without ever becoming a threat or acting outside of the user's best interests. It effectively counters the 'evil technology' trope by using technology to defeat a human villain who exploits it.
